## Source: ossf-package-analysis (075e6eae6125e0d005e14002f85781394065e51c1f07fe44ce7f88ec07db20c5)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'randombullshitgo-js' @ 105.0.1 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.

- The package executes one or more commands associated with malicious behavior.
